title: 10-28-20 DPS-BEST OF
itunes:title: 10-28-20 DPS-BEST OF
description:
On Today's episode of the Dan Patrick Show, the Dodgers have finally captured that coveted World Series title, but there are a couple side stories dominating the news cycle. Was Kevin Cash in the wrong for pulling Blake Snell when he did? How did the MLB find out about Justin Turner's COVID result so late. We're joined by MLB Network's Sean Casey, ESPN MLB Inside Jeff Passan, and Bills QB Josh Allen. Plus, DP has some information regarding Wisconsin's COVID outbreak

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
